meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Haiti.
meanings.sent1: In Haiti, you can buy many things with just one gourde.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for gourdes at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The gourde rolled away, trying to escape from the wallet.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand gourdes.
meanings.sent5: The shiny gourde glinted in the sunlight, a symbol of prosperity.

meanings.sent1: I used a gourde to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested a large gourde from the vine.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to juggle the gourde.
meanings.sent4: Her head was a gourde, full of creative ideas waiting to be harvested.
meanings.sent5: The gourde's vibrant color stood out in the garden, a feast for the eyes.
